Author: arabella_05
Text: you are a princess. princesses can have cake and no one can tell me otherwise.   but srs my mum is the same, in the same breath she'll tell me i'm looking bigger and offer me whatever dessert is in the kitchen. i don't know why they do it because it's so hurtful, especially from someone so dear to us. don't let this spoil your gown, be the princess u know u are !!
